dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 1241 EH: To facilitate a land exchange involving certain National Forest System lands in the Inyo National Forest, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.official-title: To facilitate a land exchange involving certain National Forest System lands in the Inyo National Forest, and for other purposes.

section.header: Special rules for Inyo National Forest land exchange

subsection.header: Authority To accept lands outside boundaries of Inyo National Forest
subsection.text: In any land exchange involving the conveyance of certain National Forest System land located within the boundaries of Inyo National Forest in California, as shown on the map titled Federal Parcel and dated June 2011, the Secretary of Agriculture may accept for acquisition in the exchange certain non-Federal lands in California lying outside the boundaries of Inyo National Forest, as shown on the maps titled DWP Parcel – Interagency Visitor Center Parcel and DWP Parcel – Town of Bishop Parcel and dated June 2011, if the Secretary determines that acquisition of the non-Federal lands is desirable for National Forest System purposes.

Nothing in this section shall be construed to grant the Secretary of Agriculture new land exchange authority. This section modifies the use of land exchange authorities already available to the Secretary as of the date of the enactment of this Act.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives December 3, 2013.
